word:
Chap. 60 - To Brn. Ballenger and L. Smith

                                              B-53-1890 
                          Battle Creek, Mich. January 17, 1890 

Dear Brethren Ballenger and Leon Smith: 


     Why do you pursue the course you do in keeping away from meetings whose points of truth are investigated? If you have a position, present it in clear lines.
